' + msg + ''; options.fadeIn = 0; options.fadeOut = 500; options.closeDelay = 10000; options.sticky = false; options.type = "warn"; new NotificationMessage(options); }]]>Initiates a ping test flow from a ui actionfalse function isValidMid(midServerName) { var gr = new GlideRecord('ecc_agent'); gr.addQuery('name', midServerName + ''); gr.addQuery('validated', 'true'); gr.addQuery('status', 'Up'); gr.query(); return gr.hasNext(); }; var midName = ''; var midSysId = ''; var ipLabel = gs.getMessage('Target IP'); var midLabel = gs.getMessage('MID Server'); var ipaddr = gs.getUser().getPreference('quick_discovery.ip'); var lastMidServerUsed = gs.getUser().getPreference('quick_discovery.midserver_name'); var lastMidServerSysId = gs.getUser().getPreference('quick_discovery.midserver_sysId'); if (lastMidServerUsed && isValidMid(lastMidServerUsed)) { midName = lastMidServerUsed; midSysId = lastMidServerSysId; }

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_458242114775295002329f28436d4356
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.MidServerPing</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Takes in the inputs and subflow name and returns contextId</description><name>MidServerPing</name><script><![CDATA[var MidServerPing = Class.create();
MidServerPing.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    deploySubflow: function() {
		try {
			var probename = this.getParameter('probeName');
			var midSys = this.getParameter('mid_sysID');
			var targetIP = this.getParameter('target_IP');
			var inputs = {};
			//configure subflow inputs
			inputs['mid'] = { // GlideRecord 
				table : 'ecc_agent', 
				sys_id : midSys 
			};
			inputs['ipaddress'] = targetIP; // IP Address
			var contextId = sn_fd.FlowAPI.startSubflow(probename, inputs);
			//Loop until outputs are available
			var exit = false;
			var outputs = new GlideRecord('sys_flow_runtime_value');
			while (exit == false) {
				outputs.addQuery('context', contextId);
				outputs.addQuery('type', "OUTPUT");
				outputs.query();
				if (outputs.next()) {
					var getoutputs = sn_fd.FlowAPI.getOutputs(contextId);
					var response = getoutputs.response[0];
					exit = true;
					return response;
				} else {
					//wait to reduce queries
					gs.sleep(1000);
				}
			}
		} catch(ex) {
			var errorMessage = "Error trying to execute subflow: " + ex;
			return errorMessage;
		}
	},
type: 'MidServerPing'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-24 18:42:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>458242114775295002329f28436d4356</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>MidServerPing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_458242114775295002329f28436d4356</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-30 18:58:14</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
